name: wporg-news-2021-project
description: The codebase and development environment for w.org/news.
author: WordPress.org

scripts.initial-setup: yarn && composer install && yarn run update-configs
scripts.env:setup: wp-env start --update && yarn run env:reset && yarn run env:import && yarn run env:misc
scripts.env:reset: wp-env clean all && wp-env run cli "wp site empty --yes"
scripts.start:all: yarn workspaces run start & npm run sync & (cd source/wp-content/mu-plugins/wporg-mu-plugins/ && npm run start)
